nodes.excerpt: Sizey is a MacOS app that helps you calculate aspect ratios! ⠀ — ⠀ ⚡️ Add Custom Aspect Ratios ⠀ 💥 Round to the nearest whole # ⠀ ➡️ Keyboard Shortcuts ⠀ 📐 Scale & Densities (@1x, @2x, @3x) ⠀ 🙌 Landscape & Portrait modes — ⠀ You design. We’ll math. ❤️📐
nodes.title: Sizey: Aspect Ratio Calculator - Instantly calculate any aspect ratio.
nodes.author: Meritt Thomas

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS应用程序，可以帮助您计算纵横比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定义纵横比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整数#⠀➡️键盘快捷键⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌横向和纵向模式-您设计的⠀。我们要学数学。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即时计算任何纵横比。

localize.description: Sizey是一款MacOS應用程序，可以幫助您計算縱橫比！⠀-⠀⚡️添加自定義縱橫比⠀💥舍入到最接近的整數#⠀➡️鍵盤快捷鍵⠀📐比例和密度(@1x，@2x，@3x)⠀🙌橫向和縱向模式-您設計的⠀。我們要學數學。❤️📐
localize.tagline: 即時計算任何縱橫比。

nodes.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.

localize.description: Baaz为全球零售商提供现场视频商务服务。零售店可以托管实时视频，管理目录，实时聊天，支付，送货，促销和Baaz应用程序的影响力。所有与视频直播购物相关的东西都集中在一个地方。

nodes.excerpt: Hijack Your Feed is a Safari extenion that replaces Twitter ads with your todos. It creates eye-catching posts based on your Reminders, which are then hijacked into your Twitter feed. Designed to nudge you toward your intentions… and away from doom-scrolling.
nodes.title: Hijack Your Feed - Replace Twitter ads with your todos
nodes.author: Rodolfo Rosini

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一个Safari扩展，它用你的待办事项取代了Twitter广告。它根据你的提醒创建吸引眼球的帖子，然后这些帖子会被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在将您推向您的意图…远离末日卷轴。
localize.tagline: 用您的待办事项替换Twitter广告

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一個Safari擴展，它用你的待辦事項取代了Twitter廣告。它根據你的提醒創建吸引眼球的帖子，然後這些帖子會被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在將您推向您的意圖…遠離末日卷軸。

nodes.excerpt: Transcribe your YouTube video in one click and highlight the important stuff for easy and quick reading. you-tldr let's you skim through the video transcript and skip to the good stuff. You can also download the transcript for your records.
nodes.title: you-tldr - Get the tldr of any YouTube video in seconds
nodes.author: Bilal Tahir

localize.description: 只需单击一下即可转录您的YouTube视频，并突出显示重要内容，以便轻松快速阅读。你-tldr让我们先浏览一下视频记录，然后跳到好的部分。您也可以下载文字记录作为您的记录。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内获得任何YouTube视频的tldr

localize.description: 只需單擊一下即可轉錄您的YouTube視頻，並突出顯示重要內容，以便輕鬆快速閱讀。你-tldr讓我們先瀏覽一下視頻記錄，然後跳到好的部分。您也可以下載文字記錄作爲您的記錄。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內獲得任何YouTube視頻的tldr

nodes.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.

localize.tagline: 通过测试学习Microsfot Azure基础知识

localize.description: 學習Azure基礎知識是一款應用程序，它通過在測試中回答問題來幫助你學習Microsoft Azure和雲計算的基礎知識。APP包含14個獨特的測試，269個問題，132篇文章。離線學習。APP是絕對免費的。沒有廣告。

nodes.excerpt: Where marketers go to find their people, be prolific, and hone their craft. Subscribe to get cutting edge, comprehensive, and sometimes crazy marketing ideas in your inbox every week. Join the community to connect with some of the smartest minds in marketing.

localize.description: 对于你和你的朋友来说，在Netflix上找到最好的电影或电视节目观看是一个有趣而简单的解决方案。刷过媒体名片。如果你所有的朋友都喜欢同一部电影，那就很配了！更少的滚动，更多的观看
localize.tagline: 更少的滚动，更多的观看。

localize.tagline: 更少的滾動，更多的觀看。

nodes.excerpt: Simply Snack is the easiest way to keep track of your food and diet. Log your food easily by just taking a picture of it. There’s no need for long descriptions or dull questions – and no need to stress about what you should or shouldn’t eat.
nodes.title: Simply Snack - Your daily meals at a glance.
nodes.author: Saurav Kumar

localize.description: 简单地说，零食是记录你的食物和饮食的最简单的方法。只需拍一张照片，就可以很容易地记录你的食物。不需要冗长的描述或枯燥的问题-也不需要强调你应该吃什么或不应该吃什么。
localize.tagline: 您的日常用餐一目了然。

localize.description: 簡單地說，零食是記錄你的食物和飲食的最簡單的方法。只需拍一張照片，就可以很容易地記錄你的食物。不需要冗長的描述或枯燥的問題-也不需要強調你應該喫什麼或不應該喫什麼。
localize.tagline: 您的日常用餐一目瞭然。

nodes.excerpt: DoYouNotes helps students memorize their notes faster. How? 1. upload a PDF file 2. mark the sections to study 3. review the sections (recall/show/hide content, spaced repetition, order by urgency/randomly, self-evaluate) 4. check your progress
nodes.title: DoYouNotes - Memorize your notes faster
nodes.author: Massimo Cairo

localize.description: DoYouNotes帮助学生更快地记忆笔记。如何上传？1.上传PDF文件2.标记要学习的部分3.复习各部分(回忆/显示/隐藏内容、间隔重复、按紧急程度/随机排序、自我评估)4.检查您的进度
localize.tagline: 更快地记住你的笔记

localize.description: DoYouNotes幫助學生更快地記憶筆記。如何上傳？1.上傳PDF文件2.標記要學習的部分3.複習各部分(回憶/顯示/隱藏內容、間隔重複、按緊急程度/隨機排序、自我評估)4.檢查您的進度
localize.tagline: 更快地記住你的筆記

nodes.excerpt: imbue allows influencers to create & monetize beautiful fitness experiences while allowing you unprecedented access into the fitness routines of the influencers you know & love.
nodes.title: imbue - Beautiful fitness experiences with influencers.
nodes.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: Inbue让有影响力的人创造美丽的健身体验并将其货币化，同时让你前所未有地接触到你认识的有影响力的人&你所爱的人的健身习惯。
localize.tagline: 与有影响力的人一起享受美丽的健身体验。

localize.description: Inbue讓有影響力的人創造美麗的健身體驗並將其貨幣化，同時讓你前所未有地接觸到你認識的有影響力的人&你所愛的人的健身習慣。
localize.tagline: 與有影響力的人一起享受美麗的健身體驗。
